title: Getting Started with RustCMS
content:
# Getting Started with RustCMS

Welcome to RustCMS, a high-performance content management system built with Rust.

## Installation

```bash
cargo install cms-backend
```

## Configuration

Create a `config/default.toml` file with your database settings.
excerpt: Learn how to get started with RustCMS

title: Advanced Authentication with Biscuit Tokens
content:
# Advanced Authentication

Biscuit tokens provide a secure and flexible authentication mechanism.

## Features

- Attenuable tokens
- Fine-grained permissions
- Cryptographic verification
excerpt: Deep dive into Biscuit token authentication

title: Performance Optimization Techniques
content:
# Performance Optimization

Learn how to optimize your CMS for maximum performance.

## Caching Strategies

- Redis caching
- In-memory caching
- CDN integration
excerpt: Optimize your CMS for peak performance

title: Draft: Upcoming Features in v3.1
content:
# Upcoming Features

## Planned for v3.1

- GraphQL API
- Real-time collaboration
- Enhanced search capabilities
excerpt: Preview of exciting features coming in v3.1

title: Search Engine Integration Guide
content:
# Search Integration

Integrate Tantivy full-text search into your application.

## Setup

```rust
let search_engine = SearchEngine::new("./search_index")?;
```
excerpt: Complete guide to search engine integration
